title: Fps drops
body:
Evening,
Everytime i play a game, the screen appears to be the loading screen while being ingame for 1 minute (i can hear the noise it makes when u land on summoners rift).  
To make it worse, i'm experiencing very heavy fps drops, especially when entering teamfights.
How do i fix this?
This is since 2 months now and i can barely play like this.

replies.body:
Are you using Windows 10?  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing FPS and freezing issues for some players.  Disabling that should help!

If the issue persists, then there could be other issues like drivers reducing your frame rate.  Check out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to tune up your PC.  Let me know if you have any questions.
